name: The Book Skirt!
description:
100% quilting cotton fabric - no stretch, just colour drenched fabric with gold highlights throughout! This is one of our most popular skirts, guaranteed to turn heads - especially in libraries, book shops, and other locations frequented by nerds! 

Available for custom swing skirts up to 45 inches at the waist and 24 inches in length. Contact us for larger sizes! 

Once you have purchased, we will contact you for your measurements. Turnaround is approximately 4-6 weeks, but may vary depending on our work loads. 

PLEASE NOTE: You the customer provide us with your measurements, so please take your measurements with care! We simply make our garments to the measurements YOU provide, and we cannot be held responsible if you are unhappy with the final result.

Once you have sent your measurements, they cannot be changed - we keep only a limited amount of fabric on hand, and thus cannot simply recut because you provided us with incorrect measurements.

In short, measure carefully please!

name: The Peacock Skirt
description:
100% cotton quilting fabric, available for a custom swing skirt up to 45 inches at the waist and 24 inches in length. Contact us for larger sizes! 

This beautiful fabric is colour soaked and features gold/metallic highlights throughout! 

Once you have purchased, we will contact you for your measurements. Zero stretch to the fabric, so please measure yourself carefully. Expected turnaround is 4-6 weeks, but please be aware that depending on our work loads, it may be longer. 

PLEASE NOTE: You the customer provide us with your measurements, so please take your measurements with care! We simply make our garments to the measurements YOU provide, and we cannot be held responsible if you are unhappy with the final result.

Once you have sent your measurements, they cannot be changed - we keep only a limited amount of fabric on hand, and thus cannot simply recut because you provided us with incorrect measurements.

In short, measure carefully please!

name: Lilac cotton sateen circle skirts
description:
Lilac cotton sateen circle skirts! Plus sizes available! 

Fabric is 97% cotton, 3% spandex - gives the fabric a slight sheen and some stretch.

All skirts are 24 inches long, have a 2 inch deep waistband, zip  at the back of the skirt with hook/eye closure, and hidden side seam pockets. 

Skirts have up to 2 inches stretch; a 31 to 33 inch waist should order the 32 inch skirt; a 48 to 50 inch waist shoulder order the 49 inch skirt. 
Payment plans are available, email bettylebonbon@gmail.com to discuss!

name: Black cotton sateen circle skirts!
description:
Black cotton sateen circle skirts!

We are RESTOCKING these in 2014! Until January 31, you are welcome to pre-order in any size you like. Pre-ordering has two significant benefits: you'll guarantee a skirt in your size, AND you'll pay the special pre-order price of $45 (skirts are usually $55)! Skirts will be sent out late February/early March.

Fabric is 97% cotton, 3% spandex - giving the fabric a slight sheen and some stretch.

All skirts are 24 inches long, have a 2 inch deep waistband, zip  at the back of the skirt, and side seam pockets. 

Skirts have up to an inch and a half of stretch - someone with a 45 inch waist will be able to fit into the size 26 skirt! If you're unsure which size to order, please get in touch and we'll help you out! If your size isn't listed, let me know and I'll add it. 

Payment plans are available, email bettylebonbon@gmail.com to discuss!

name: Registered Post Upgrade for International Post
description:
Our standard post does not include registered post, tracking or signature on delivery, and unfortunately we cannot take responsibility if your parcel doesn't arrive.

To avoid any issues for international customers, you can upgrade to registered post. 
 
Registered post covers;

*proof the article was sent when lodged at the post office counter
*proof the article was received - a signature is obtained on delivery
*compensation for loss or damage of the article up to $100 for a standard registered delivery 
*Two week delivery time to major cities. 

Please note, this does NOT include tracking.

name: Gift Voucher
description:
A gift voucher makes a great gift for Christmas, allowing your loved ones to choose exactly what they like from our wonderful range of Betty Le Bonbon fabrics and products! 

We have $55 and $90 options, but you're welcome to email us and ask for a specific amount if you'd like another option! 

Purchase your voucher, and we can either send you a Betty Le Bonbon postcard with a unique store code on the back, or we can simply email you the voucher details after you've purchased. We'll get in touch to find out which you'd prefer. Easy!

name: Junk food tote!
description:
For carrying all your emergency chocolate bars! 



This delightful fabric is 100% cotton and the photo doesn't do the colours justice - bold, bright and cheery, it'll put a grin on your face whenever you look at it!

Our totes measure approximately 16 inches by 16 inches, and are approximately 4 inches wide. They're lined with sturdy black cotton drill and feature cotton drill handles/straps long enough to sling over your shoulder.

Due to present work loads, expect a six-to-eight week turnaround (not including postage! International customers, this can be an added 2-4 weeks!).

name: Faux Fur Stole - READY TO SHIP!
description:
FAUX fur stole!

Deliciously soft and cozy! Lined with satin on the underside, and fastens with a simple hook and eye. Can be worn long over the collarbone, or adjusted to drape off the shoulders - or simply wrap around the neck like a scarf! 

In stock and ready to ship now!
